meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>lively</kanji> <kanji>move</kanji>s you make are your <vocabulary>activity</vocabulary>.

活動 includes all kinds of activities, including nature activities, club activities, economic activity, and so on!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
